title: What are some recommended books on Ericksonian Hypnotherapy and Coaching by Richard Bandler and other authors?
first_phrase: This text is a list of relevant books on the topics of hypnosis, neuro-linguistic programming (NLP), and coaching. Moving further down the list, the last 200 tokens mention ''Tales of Enchantment'' by Stephen Lankton, which is a book about Ericksonian Hypnotherapy. The author discusses how trance work can be used in therapy sessions and suggests ways in which clinicians can apply this approach in their work. This book aligns with the ideas presented in Richard Bandler's ''Frogs into Princes'' and ''Magic in Action'', as well as John Grinder's ''Patterns of the Hypnotic Techniques of Milton H. Erickson''.
